comment: Following a lager brewing methodology using Greg Noonan's [u]New Brewing Lager Beer[/u].

Primary Fermentation started with "pitching" three (3) packets of Mangrove Jacks M27 hydrated in 1/3 cup of room-temperature water ~1 hour before being pitched; pitching temperature 72F; fermentation temperature: 50-55F for 10-20 days; raise temperature to 62-68, hold until fermentation is complete; return temperature to 55F, transfer to a clean carboy, lower temperature to 30-33F, hold for at least 3 days! Maintain temperature

Began d-rest on February 2, transferred 02082015
SG: 1.028.
